author: Steph_a_nee
title: A bit surprised at the quality of the plastic
review:
My son was given this set for his 3rd birthday.  We own several other sets that include a front loader so I was quite surprised at the quality of the plastic of the front loader bucket and the clamp bucket on the crane.  Both are of a much thinner and more flexible plastic than the buckets on our other front loaders.  Also the plastic is a matte finish, not glossy looking like other Duplo Lego parts.  The large rock base and the round chutes are made of the same thin plastic.

 

I'm a little disappointed at the friction joints on the crane arm.  It doesn't always "catch" and the arm drops down quite easily - even when empty.

 

Otherwise, I can't complain.  My son loves the set.  He's seen a TV show about a stone quarry and had no trouble figuring out what it was supposed to be.
